scripts.build: yarn workspace '@flocon-trpg/api-server' run build && yarn workspace '@flocon-trpg/web-server' run build:deps
scripts.format: yarn lint --fix && yarn prettier && yarn sort-package-json
scripts.prettier: yarn prettier:base --write --cache && yarn workspaces foreach -pv run prettier
scripts.prettier-check: yarn prettier:base --check && yarn workspaces foreach -pv run prettier-check
